name: Star Wars: Episode III: Revenge of the Sith
name_original: Star Wars: Episode III: Revenge of the Sith
description:
Anakin Skywalker is falling deeper into the dark side under the tutelage of Darth Sidious and it is up to Obi-Wan Kenobi to stop him.
